## Scale: Melodic in G# (Mode: Hindu)

- G# (Root)
- A#
- B
- Cx (C double sharp)
- D# (E flat)
- E#
- F## (G double sharp)

The intervals in this scale create an otherworldly and enchanting quality, characterized by the augmented seconds and unique half-step patterns found within its structure.
